name: Wizards, wisdom and weight
description:
Wizards, wisdom and weight is a difficult platformer made for Mini Jam 75: Wisdom,

You play the role of a wizard in search for wisdom, however, wisdom is not obtained easily and to get it you must navigate your way through  obstacles and enemies. 

Do you likey restarting a level many times? Tight jumps? Dodging spikes at crazy speeds? If so, then you might like this.

Will you become wiser?
